mapper.select: select u.department, sum(product.product) as department_product from product inner join user u on product.user_id = u.id where product > 0 and u.department in ('Z1','Z2','F1','F2') and year(product.updated_at)=#{year} group by u.department order by department_product desc

select pt.name as name, max(u.department) as department, sum(product.product) as sum from product inner join user u on u.id = product.user_id inner join project p on product.process_id = p.process_id inner join project_type pt on p.type = pt.type_id where p.total_product > 0 and year(p.updated_at)=2022 and u.department=#{department} group by pt.name order by sum desc

select project.type, Max(pt.name) as name, count(project.total_product) as count,sum(project.total_product) as sum from project inner join project_type pt on project.type = pt.type_id where project.total_product > 0 and year(project.updated_at)=2022 group by project.type order by sum desc
